{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03436v1", "title": "Two Layer Model via Non Quasi Periodic Normal Form Theory", "summary": "The two layer model is a 2+1/2 degrees of freedom non autonomous dynamical
system whose lower order expansion exhibits capture in resonance, numerically
detected in a previous paper by the authors. In this paper, we reframe the
model along the lines of a suitable version of (which we refer to as non quasi
periodic) normal form theory and provide an explicit amount of the resonance
trapping time, which is estimated as exponentially long, in terms of the small
parameters of the system. Key words: capture into resonance; non quasi periodic
normal form theory; friction. MSC 2020: 37J40; 70F40.", "main_category": "math-ph", "categories": "math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-05-06T11:22:26Z"}
